title: Enhancing Software Development Practical Competencies: Data-Driven Learning Analytics Design in Distributed Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can integrate and analyze multiple data sources collected from distributed learning systems (LMS, video platforms, collaboration tools).
Learners can design models to predict learning behaviors and the effectiveness of instructional methods using regression/classification techniques.
Learners can interpret cross-platform analysis results and apply them to develop personalized learning strategies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
